member.name: IMFMediaEngineSupportsSourceTransfer.AttachMediaSource
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSupportsSourceTransfer.DetachMediaSource
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSupportsSourceTransfer.ShouldTransferSource
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the source should be transferred.
member.param: true if the source should be transferred; otherwise, false.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSupportsSourceTransfer
member.summary: Enables the media source to be transferred between the media engine and the sharing engine for Play To.
